column4: Speak|Player|Good morning. What a glorious time (8 a.m.) to be alive on this fine Tuesday.
Speak|Player|I better get going if I don't want to be late to my job at the local coffee shop.
Speak|Player|What's that? Someone at the door? Must be the mailman.

column1: -- boss yells at you if you haven't done your job by 9:30

column4: Speak|Boss|Where have you been?  There are customers wanting their coffee!

column1: -- customer four & a cultist come in (only if all customers served)
